name: Milagro Marketing
tagline: San Jose Marketing and Advertising Agency
description:
Milagro Marketing us a full-service advertising agency open for business in 2002. Historically Hispanic advertising has created communication messages that have been based on stereotypes.
Its because of this that Milagro Marketing was born, our team is passionate about creating culturally relevant and socially conscious communications, advertising and creative. We reach, speak to, and embrace Hispanics through marketing communications.
